|Actor = [[Kenneth Hadley]]|Religion = [[Faith of the Seven]]}}An unidentified '''Septon''' is a minor character who appears in [[Season 3|third season]] episode "[[The Rains of Castamere (episode)|The Rains of Castamere]]". He's portrayed by [[Kenneth Hadley]].
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 3]]===
The septon carries out the wedding between Lord [[Edmure Tully]] and [[Roslin Frey]].<ref>"[[The Rains of Castamere (episode)|The Rains of Castamere]]"</ref>
